description: Landlord-friendliness scores by state (1-10 scale, 10 = most landlord-friendly)
methodology: Based on: eviction timeline, rent control restrictions, security deposit limits, property tax rates, tenant protection laws

AL.notes: No rent control, fast evictions (7-14 days), low property taxes

AK.notes: No rent control, moderate eviction timeline, high costs

AZ.notes: No rent control, 5-day eviction notice, landlord-friendly courts

AR.notes: No rent control, fast evictions, minimal tenant protections

CA.notes: Statewide rent control, strict tenant protections, long eviction process

CO.notes: Some cities have rent control, moderate protections

CT.notes: Strong tenant protections, slow eviction process

DE.notes: Moderate tenant protections, reasonable eviction timeline

FL.notes: No rent control, 3-day eviction notice, landlord-friendly

GA.notes: No rent control, fast evictions, minimal tenant protections

ID.notes: No rent control, 3-day eviction notice, landlord-friendly

IL.notes: Chicago has strong tenant protections, rest of state moderate

IN.notes: No rent control, 10-day eviction notice, landlord-friendly

IA.notes: No rent control, moderate eviction timeline

ME.notes: Some rent control, strong tenant protections

MD.notes: Baltimore has tenant protections, moderate overall

MA.notes: Strong tenant protections, rent control history

MI.notes: No rent control, moderate eviction timeline

MN.notes: St. Paul has rent control, moderate protections elsewhere

MS.notes: No rent control, fast evictions, minimal regulations

MO.notes: No rent control, moderate eviction timeline

MT.notes: No rent control, moderate tenant protections

NV.notes: No rent control but growing tenant protections

NJ.notes: Strong rent control in many cities, strict tenant protections

NY.notes: Strong rent control in NYC, very tenant-friendly statewide

NC.notes: No rent control, 10-day eviction notice, landlord-friendly

OH.notes: No rent control, reasonable eviction timeline

OK.notes: No rent control, 5-day eviction notice, very landlord-friendly

OR.notes: Statewide rent control, strong tenant protections

PA.notes: No rent control, moderate eviction timeline

TN.notes: No rent control, 14-day eviction notice, landlord-friendly

TX.notes: No rent control, 3-day eviction notice, very landlord-friendly

WA.notes: Seattle has strong tenant protections, statewide rules increasing

WY.notes: No rent control, 3-day eviction notice, minimal regulations
